text: Nineteen Eighty-Four is a 1984 British dystopian science fiction movie directed by Michael Radford and was based on the 1949 novel of the same name by George Orwell. It stars John Hurt, Richard Burton, Cyril Cusack, Suzanna Hamilton, Gregor Fisher, Roger Lloyd-Peck, Shirley Stelfox, Stephen Yardley, Hugh Walters and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It features music by the group Eurythmics. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1984 science fiction movies Category:British science fiction movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Radford Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies set in factories Category:Movies about totalitarianism Category:Movies about freedom of expression Category:Movies about security and surveillance Category:Movies about censorship
title: Nineteen Eighty-Four (1984 movie)
